text: The Hard Ride is an action movie from 1971. It is about a U.S. Marine. He promises to take care of a dead friend's motorcycle. Then he is threatened by a gang of bikers. The movie was written and directed by Burt Topper. It stars Robert Fuller, Sherry Bain, and Tony Russel. The soundtrack has a version of Swing Low Sweet Chariot on it. == References == Category:1971 action movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:Movies directed by Burt Topper
